title.rendered: Webinar: Student Activation Best Practices with Handshake Marketing – July 2020

content.rendered:
Resources shared in the presentation:

  • The Handshake Student Marketing Toolkit for resources to promote Handshake and engage students remotely
  • The Virtual Career Fair Launch Kit for how-to guides, email templates, videos, and more to send to your students and employers ahead of your virtual fair

View more career center webinars

excerpt.rendered: The student marketing team at Handshake will walk through their best practices plus updates to the Marketing and Virtual Fair Launch Kits
